title: Boku no Hero Academia (ONA)
content:
If you don't mind filler academia then I'm sure you're gonna enjoy this one, as did I.
THee first episode is baseball centric, an intense game between the teachers and some students, I don't personally like baseball but there was still fun to be had.
I think that the second episode is really what his ONA is about. Mr. Smiley is probably one of the best an most OP heroes to be introduced, the man can make anyone laugh historically for 2 hours, think about abdomen pain, sheesh. THe ole fact that we get otherwise serious characters to smile goofily is what makes this all worth it.
